str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To ask, request, petition, demand. Of uncertain derivation; to ask.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I receive, get, (b) I take, lay hold of.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To seek, search for, desire, require, demand. Of uncertain affinity; to seek; specially, to worship, or to plot.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolonged form of a primary heuro, which heureo is used for it in all the tenses except the present and imperfect to find.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Dative Masculine Singular
str2: To knock, beat a door with a stick, to gain admittance. Apparently a primary verb; to rap.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To open. From ana and oigo; to open up.
